explains: adj. 易怒的，急躁的；（身体部位或器官）过敏的；（生物机体）应激性的
wordGroup: irritable bowel syndrome [医]肠道易激综合症

sentences.en: Irritable bowel syndrome seems to affect more women than men.
sentences.cn: 肠易激综合症对女性比对男性影响更大。

sentences.en: He had been waiting for over an hour and was beginning to feel irritable.
sentences.cn: 他已经等了一个多小时，开始觉得有些烦躁了。

sentences.en: They feel irritable and depressed, often isolated and lonely.
sentences.cn: 他们感到烦躁和抑郁，经常感到孤立和孤独。
